QuestData.Title: Come Together
QuestData.Description: Gul'dan and his cronies would do well to remember this day. We Auchenai are not to be trifled with.$B$BYou should inform Vindicator Icia in your outpost of our success. She can reach out to the scattered refugees and their families.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Vindicator Icia at Fort Wrynn.
QuestData.RewardText: I will gather any remaining survivors so we can rebuild what we have lost.$B$BThank you.
